name: Halloween Pumkins
summary: Halloween Pumpkins is a shooting game available on www.flash-games.net. It is very interesting to play and very easy. Move your mouse to aim the target you want to shoot. Click mouse for throwing the pumpkin to the ghost, you have got 30 pumpkins to use, however, you have a pumpkin tree, and the pumpkin will grow every three seconds.
info:
• 中文名: 万圣节打鬼
  • 别名: Pumpkin Toss
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: STG / Flash
  • 游戏制作: E Greetings

  • 发行日期: 2003
